messages.title: I'm proud of my record: fighting back for you
messages.content: I’ve fought tooth and nail for our community and to make sure your voice is heard in Westminster. Two years ago, you put your trust in me to serve our community as your Member of Parliament. I try to repay that trust by working hard every day to make sure your voice is heard again in Westminster. From fighting to save our steel and challenging Tory and Lib Dem cuts to our schools and hospitals, to securing investment for our town centres, I have been your local champion. You are my boss. I’m asking for your support again to continue to serve you and to fight your corner.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fought tooth and nail for our steelworks when the Tories closed it, and helped secure compensation for steelworkers via Community Union.
Campaigned against medical centre closures and housing on our green wedge.
Helped secure £5 million investment for our job centres.
Won back over £200,000 for local people.
Brought forward a Bill to toughen up animal cruelty sentences.
Voted to trigger Article 50 after you spoke loud and clear.
